definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)

sentences.english: Companies adhere to the "customer first, seeking the amount of profit" for the purpose.
sentences.chinese: 公司堅持“顧客至上，以量求利”爲宗旨。

sentences.english: Our company always values its customers’ satisfaction in taking care of every quality requirement and providing best speeding services in reasonable prices.
sentences.chinese: 本公司顧客至上，質量超卓，效率快捷，取價公道。

sentences.english: Gratuity is customary in this money-mad metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在這個金錢至上的都市裏，給小費是司空見慣的。

sentences.english: Gratuity is customary in this money-mad  metropolis.
sentences.chinese: 在這個金錢至上的大都市裏，給小費是司空見慣的。

sentences.english: A nonrepresentational style that emphasizes formal values over the representation of subject matter.
sentences.chinese: 強調形式至上，無視內容的一種非寫實主義繪畫作風。

sentences.english: It would be a cashless journey through the land of the almighty dollar.
sentences.chinese: 那將是一次身無分文的在美元至上的土地上的旅行。

sentences.english: White supremacists devise new methods to disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.chinese: 白人至上論者想出新的方法以剝奪黑人的公民權。

sentences.english: You should start with a top-down approach to performance tuning.
sentences.chinese: 您應該採用至上而下的性能調優方法。

sentences.english: The Monetary Maniacs may ascribe the entire move to low interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣至上論者可能會將整個上漲歸因於低利率。

sentences.english: Ewok spiritualism has a wide pantheon of gods and spirits.
sentences.chinese: 伊沃克人的精神至上觀念裏有着各種各樣的神靈。

sentences.english: The user is supreme, pay close attention to the quality of the project.
sentences.chinese: 以用戶至上爲基點，狠抓工程質量。

sentences.english: The Buddha is my foremost refuge.
sentences.chinese: 我別無歸依，佛是我的至上歸依。
我實行了“不計後果的消費至上主義”麼？

sentences.english: The Japanese workplace is not quite as sexist as it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 日本的工作場所已經不像以前那樣的男性至上主義。

sentences.english: You get this alpha male effect, " Underhill says."
sentences.chinese: 他說，“這樣就會出現男性至上的效應。”

sentences.english: "Customer-oriented, to victory" is the macro security has always pursued the principle of service.
sentences.chinese: “品質第一，客戶至上”是宏安一貫奉行的服務宗旨。

definition: to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
to hold up (as an model)/to hold in esteem/to revere/to advocate
based on.../in conformance with../taking as one's main principle
to follow through/to carry through to the end
the Way of the King/statecraft/benevolent rule/virtuous as opposed to the Way of Hegemon 霸道
